transcript: no one likes epic Heroes without Epic monsters and so you have to go through the rocky cut scene you have to have those periods of time where you doubt yourself or everyone else doubts yourself where the walls are crumbling around you because have you ever read shoe dog fil night story about Nike the entire story is just him getting kicked in the nuts for 30 years that's the whole story and then he's like oh yeah and then I built Nike and the thing is is that when you die the only thing that will remain is the story that people will tell of you and so wouldn't you want that to be an epic story
